title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 46.2 - Requirement of permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 46.2 - Requirement of permit

State Regulations
(a) Entry onto, or use of, any State-owned tidal wetlands under the jurisdiction of or managed
by the department, by any person(s) except authorized agents of the department, is prohibited unless such person(s) possess a valid tidal wetland access
permit. (b) The tidal wetland
access permit is issued by the regional director, or the regional director's
designee, for the region in which the wetland is located. Applications for such
permits may be made to the department at the appropriate regional
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
46.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
